title: White Rice
description: The infamous pilot episode of the canceled sitcom White Rice. What happens when an adopted white girl is raised by a Chinese family?
quote: You are a reverse banana. You are white on outside, yellow on inside.
altHero: Francine, a blonde white woman, with her Chinese family
alt1: Francine on a step ladder while her Chinese parents speak to her
alt2: Francine talking to her husband while a man walks in with a basket of kittens
alt3: Francine talks to her mother in the kitchen
